section.title: Pre-Install Requirements and Prerequisites
section.para: Ensure that the following requirements have been met before continuing with the install.

section.title: Hardware Requirements
section.para: MUX does not have any hardware requirements.

section.title: Software Prerequisites
section.para: MUX must be deployed either in JBoss4 or JBoss5 . However it is possible to addapt configuration files and run in any JMX container.

section.title: Source Code
section.para: This section provides instructions on how to obtain and build the &THIS.PLATFORM; Diameter MUX from source code.

step.title: Downloading the source code

important.para: Subversion is used to manage its source code. Instructions for using Subversion, including install, can be found at

step.para: Use SVN to checkout a specific release source, the base URL is &THIS.MUX_RELEASE_SOURCE_CODE_URL;, then add the specific release version, lets consider &THIS.VERSION;.

step.title: Building the source code

important.para: Maven 2.0.9 (or higher) is used to build the release. Instructions for using Maven2, including install, can be found at

step.para: Use Maven to build the deployable unit binary.
Once the process finishes you should have the SAR built. If JBOSS_HOME environment variable is set, after execution SAR will be deployed in container.

note.para: By default &THIS.PLATFORM; Diameter MUX; deploys in JBoss4 SAR. To change it run maven with profile switch: -Pjboss5
